## Description
The **Compare **operator allows to verify if an input string is equal to the string defined in the configuration settings.

## **Input**
**Input**

**Data type**

**Description**

**in0**

String

The text string that you want to compare to the string defined in the settings

## **Output**
**Output**

**Data type**

**Description**

**out0**

Integer number

- **0** if the text string provided in input is equal to the string defined in the configuration settings

- ***-1 ***if the text string provided in input is shorter than the string defined in the configuration settings

- **1** in all other cases

## **![](data:image/png;base64,)****Settings**
- In the **Equals **text field, enter the string that you want to compare to the input string.

- Click **Apply **to confirm.

## **Special cases**
In special cases, the operator behaves as follows:

**Case**

**Behavior**

**NULL input (no input)**

The operator returns the value ***-1***. The system logs a warning message.
